description: Redevelopment of the site for residential development, comprising a 6 to 8 storey building (measuring 31m AOD), to provide 64 residential units (Class C3), and the provision of public and private open space, undercroft parking and public realm improvements.  (This application is linked to a separate planning application ref: PA/11/01945 for the erection of 121 residential units at 1 to 18 Dollar Bay Court, 4 Lawn House Close. These applications are linked for reasons relating to the provision of off-site affordable housing).
